The presence of the ANC logo on the bill: which appears in brighter colors than the rest of the image, indicating that it has been doctored.
The discovery of a reverse image search: taken at the same location, but with a different message about rape in Finland, exposing the doctored nature of the image.
The identification of the original messa: which was part of a campaign to help rape victims and included information about seeking free treatment in Liberia.
The confirmation from the US fact: checking website Snopes that the Finnish version of the image had been doctored and exposed as such back in 2016.
